instructions: After you receive all tool call results, apply these business rules IN ORDER to refine the category and subcategory. Later rules override earlier ones.

rules.name: Title-Based Overrides
rules.description: Check title for specific keywords that override category

conditions.reasoning: Protein powder products always go to ACTIVE NUTRITION
Weight loss products always go to weight management category

rules.name: Ingredient-Specific Overrides
rules.description: Override category/subcategory based on specific ingredient names

conditions.if: primary_ingredient in ['SPIRULINA', 'SPIRULINA BLUE GREEN ALGAE', 'ALGAE', 'ALGAE - OTHER', 'SEA MOSS', 'CHLORELLA', 'CHLOROPHYLL / CHLORELLA']

rules.name: Protein Category Override
rules.description: All protein ingredients go to SPORTS NUTRITION

conditions.if: primary_ingredient contains any of: ['PROTEIN', 'WHEY', 'ISOLATE', 'CASEIN', 'PEA PROTEIN', 'SOY PROTEIN']
conditions.reasoning: All protein supplements are categorized under sports nutrition

rules.name: Herb Formula Logic
rules.description: Count herbs to determine if FORMULAS or SINGLES

conditions.if: primary category = 'HERBAL REMEDIES' AND count of ingredients with category='HERBAL REMEDIES' >= 2
primary category = 'HERBAL REMEDIES' AND count of ingredients with category='HERBAL REMEDIES' = 1

rules.name: Multivitamin Refinement
rules.description: Refine multivitamin subcategory based on age + gender + title

conditions.then: Apply the following subcategory refinement logic:

priority_2_age_and_gender.if: gender = 'GENDER - MALE' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - ADULT'
gender = 'GENDER - MALE' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - NON SPECIFIC'
gender = 'GENDER - MALE' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - MATURE ADULT'
gender = 'GENDER - FEMALE' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - ADULT'
gender = 'GENDER - FEMALE' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - NON SPECIFIC'
gender = 'GENDER - FEMALE' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - MATURE ADULT'
gender = 'GENDER - NON SPECIFIC' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - ADULT'
gender = 'GENDER - NON SPECIFIC' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - NON SPECIFIC'
gender = 'GENDER - NON SPECIFIC' AND age = 'AGE GROUP - MATURE ADULT'

priority_3_title_override.note: THIS OVERRIDES ALL AGE/GENDER RULES ABOVE! Highest priority!

important_notes: PRENATAL title override is HIGHEST priority for multivitamins
